name: True-joystick-
tagline: A simple joystick done with deep research
body:
### True Joystick
A Virtual Joystick for Unity3d, with Auto Hiding Joystick . Dynamic Joystick position .
It is inspired by a Gamesutra article and a Youtube Video [Watch here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-sEJ4Lo0cm8).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
